6/ The Binance chain is paramount to the long term potential of BNB. In Binance chain, BNB holders will be able to generate profits from other people's trades. That is, BNB holders will have perpetual cash flow

2/ The most important thing to understand is the long term opportunity for BNB:  In the long run, the vision is that *all* value that flows through the Binance ecosystem will accrue to BNB directly.  Binance Chain is the first step in that direction.

Very common misconception  Stock buybacks traditionally return cash flow bc they increase earnings per share  But with BNB, all the token gets you is a FIXED discount  Increasing your *proportion* of tokens w. a fixed discount doesn’t increase BNBs value bc cash flow is unchanged
